content:
Dear Client,

As a senior level content strategist, I am pleased to present to you a 20/60/90 day execution plan that will help improve your website traffic and make the content more organized and effective.

Here is a summary of the plan:

20 Days:

* Analyze the current traffic and usage patterns on your website pages
* Identify low-usage pages that can be consolidated
* Work with the content and design teams to determine the most effective structure for the consolidated pages
* Develop a detailed plan for the consolidation, including timelines and responsibilities

60 Days:

* Begin implementing the consolidation plan
* Work with the content and design teams to ensure the new structure is intuitive and user-friendly
* Evaluate the results of the consolidation and make any necessary adjustments
* Communicate the changes to your audience through social media and email campaigns

90 Days:

* Complete the consolidation and evaluate its impact on your website traffic
* Develop a plan to maintain and update the new structure going forward
* Continuously monitor and analyze website traffic to make informed decisions about future changes and improvements

In conclusion, the consolidation of low-usage pages into a smaller, more organized set will improve the user experience on your website, making it easier for your audience to find the information they need. By following this 20/60/90 day execution plan, you will be able to maximize the benefits of this consolidation and drive more traffic to your site.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I am here to help and support you every step of the way.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
